name: comment-overlay
description: Slack thread comments overlay on Desktop
author: Comment Overlay Contributors

scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build
scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.pack: npm run build:all && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build:all && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.dist:win: npm run build:all && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --win
scripts.dist:linux: npm run build:all && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --linux
scripts.dist:all: npm run build:all && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --mac --win --linux
